meanings.definition: Writing by hand rather than typing or printing.
meanings.sent1: I prefer using longhand to write letters to my grandma.
meanings.sent2: Her longhand was elegant and easy to read.
meanings.sent3: The detective deciphered the suspect's longhand note with ease.
meanings.sent4: His longhand revealed the care and attention he put into his work.
meanings.sent5: The teacher emphasized the importance of practicing neat longhand.

meanings.definition: The style or method of handwriting.
meanings.sent1: In school, we were taught cursive longhand for our assignments.
meanings.sent2: Her longhand had a unique flair that made it stand out.
meanings.sent3: The longhand on the old document looked like a secret code.
meanings.sent4: His longhand mirrored his personality - bold and expressive.
meanings.sent5: The calligrapher's longhand was a work of art in itself.
